code: @Test public void testThrowExceptionNullMessage() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:start").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(0).     try {         template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").         fail("Should have thrown an exception").     } catch (CamelExecutionException e) {         assertIsInstanceOf(IllegalArgumentException.class, e.getCause()).         assertEquals(null, e.getCause().getMessage()).     }     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:start").to("mock:start").throwException(IllegalArgumentException.class, null).to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").to("mock:start").throwException(IllegalArgumentException.class, null).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
